item.title: NLP Project
item.description: Craigslist (stylized as craigslist) is an American classified advertisements website. The craigslist platform is advertiser oriented, providing a simple, low-structure interface where advertisers can create their ads with few constraints.

item.title: Sentiment Analysis
item.description: To predict the market closing price based on twitter sentiment analysis and to create trading strategies for investors based on sentiment analysis.
